Module it.polimi.ingsw.am45
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am45.view.TUI.commandhandler

Class CommandPlayCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am45.view.TUI.commandhandler.CommandPlayCard
public class CommandPlayCard extends Object
The CommandPlayCard class represents a command to play a card in the game. It extends the Command class and overrides the execute method to perform the command.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute()
      Executes the command. Handles the playing of a card by the user.

    • getUserChoice

      private int getUserChoice()
      Gets the user's choice of card to play.
      Returns:
      the index of the chosen card

    • getCardPosition

      private int[] getCardPosition()
      Gets the position to play the card.
      Returns:
      an array containing the row and column to play the card

    • playCard

      private boolean playCard(int chosenCard, int[] position)
      Plays the chosen card at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      chosenCard - the index of the chosen card
      position - the position to play the card
      Returns:
      true if the card was played successfully, false otherwise

    • drawCardFromMarket

      private void drawCardFromMarket()
      Draws a card from the market after playing a card.

    • getDrawCardType

      private static int getDrawCardType(int chosenOption, BufferedReader reader)
      Gets the type of card to draw from the deck or market.
      Parameters:
      chosenOption - the chosen option (1 for deck, 2 for market)
      reader - the BufferedReader to read user input
